column5: No little kids around here anymore so we always open our gifts on Christmas Eve.  I hafta tell you, Santa left so much stuff here last night, that there may not be enough left for any of the rest of youz   Have a great day everyone and I hope the fat man is as good to you as he was to me
Morning Lew, and everyone else, Merry Christmas and have a great day.  Maureen
Morning Lew. Haven't been to bed yet. Lets hope the next year is better!
He was here, he was here!!!  Merry Christmas everyone....

And Merry Christmas to you too . . . .     the fat man (the one with whiskers, but no hair . .  heh . .   HO??) got me a nice new 21" H P flat-screen monitor . . . .     now I can see what I'm looking at!! AMAZING at how much they've dropped in price. It was this . . .     or a new Vexilar . . . .      but since there won't be SAFE  (for me) ice till after mid-February (if then) just not worth it to get to use it 3 times! Just headin' east a bit . . . .     got some nicely wrapped l'il presents for any trout lurking within my range . . . .      first time wettin' a line in 2 months!

Greetings to all, hope the rolly polly man in red, black and white filled your stockings(pantyhose for those inclined that way), and everyone is happy.  Hope you get a real line burner this morning Steve.
Good morning and a Merry Christmas to all

well it looks like    made it here also now I just have to wait for the kids to get up maybe some time around 8:30 or 9 they will srawl down the stairs. I never understood how they can sleep in I think my daughter has awaken at 8am one year and that was the earliest I will even wake them up if I have to. I dont know what all I got but from the looks of the head of that thumper woodie sticking outta my stocking I think the wife is on the right track. Merry Christmas again everyone
Morning folks, he made it here as well.  Dropping a ride on John Deere front loader (kiddie size) for the Wee Coop!  I can't wait to see his eyes.

Jolly OOOO made it here also, Like Lew No kids on Xmas Morn, but we celebrated xmas last night with the kids and the grandkids so we are just having our first morning cup of coffee before we open our gifts to each other. I was just wondering though, who's more excited the parents-grandparents, our the little ones HUM  Merry Christmas

Good morning and Merry hoho to all.  We have a house full of grandkids this morning (not up yet).  They made their way in from Edmonton yesterday.  Not used to it but I'm sure we'll survive.  Now I have to go stuff a bird.
Good morning Lew and everyone,  Hope you and your families have a great day over there,  Greetings from all the family here in the Worsfold household.

Good morning Lew Merry Christmas  Were doing Christmas Tommorow im at work today for 12 filling in for a guy he tried all year to get someone to take it so at the last min I told him I would do it for him
Good morning and Merry Christmas everyone. Santa has left the building AND the goodies!
Good morning and Merry Christmas!
merry christmas
Phew!...What a night !!!  Looks like the old boy got a real workout...    All the beast from Maribeth and Beans...we hope you got what you wanted or wanted what you got
Good morning everyone, I hope everyone recieved what they were hoping for and gave even more  Merry Christmas.  Gerritt.
morning to all and merry xmas,and yes the fat man was here too,he was very generous as well,
Yep he was here too  Mornin' Lew and Merry Christmas to everyone
Good morning to all.My family and myself want to wish every one here at OFC a Very Very Merry Christmas.And hopes of meeting more of you guys this year.
